评论详情: Christmas gift
These joggers are super comfy, lightweight, and the zipper pockets are nice for keeping your stuff safe. Perfect for lounging or running errands. Fit’s on point too! True to size.

I love these pants for walking! They are definitely good for warmer weather, but not thick enough in cooler winter temps. The material is very silky/smooth, and I like that they offer roominess as compared to leggings. I sized up to make sure they were loose, and they fit well due to the drawstring at the waist. They have worn and washed well!

评论概述: Great pants. Runs a little big.
评论详情: I am going through a leopard phase, I guess. This is my second pair of leopard joggers this year. I very much enjoy the print pattern. It's sort of a metallic on matte, and it's very cool! I used that size chart, but they run a little big, and fit more like wide leg pants than joggers, but it's not overwhelming. They are a nice weight for fall, and the material is quite nice quality. They are very comfy, and I love to wear them. In particular, the waistband is extra wide, and feels nice on. Plus, they stay up very well. Also: The cuffs at the ankles are unique, comfortable, wide, and don't dig into the skin, like a normal elastic cuff. I love that part.

These joggers are super lightweight, making them perfect for workouts or lounging in warmer weather. The fabric is thin though, which is great for breathability, but it does wrinkle easily, especially when you get them since they come vacuum-sealed. You might need to iron or steam them before wearing them to get rid of all the creases.  That said, they’re still very comfortable to wear. The high-waisted fit is a great fit, and the adjustable drawstring is great. The zipper pockets are also great, but they do feel like they're a little on the cheaper side, so they don't slide open as easily as expected.

The material used to make these joggers is a nice weight. It feels substantial, not flimsy, while not being too heavy; and it drapes really nicely. Also, the drawstrings annd zippers are well-made, and I can tell they will hold up nicely. The green is a classic “army green” shade that goes with everything. And, they are truly high-waisted, as described. The material is nice enough that these are great for wearing out and about in casual situations, not just comfortable pants to wear at home. I think they run a bit large overall, and they’ll be too long if you’re petite. So, it’s worth taking your measurements and comparing them to the size chart before ordering. I definitely recommend these and think they would make a very nice gift if you have someone in your life who likes joggers. I’m including a few photos that hopefully will help everyone see some of the details I described.
True to size...am a 27" waist but wanted a looser fit so I got a M & it hangs comfortably around the waist & gives me ample leg room.

EDITED REVIEW: I tried a size xsmall, and the pants fit really nicely. I am typically a small but always size up to a medium in athletic clothes (leggings, joggers, etc.), so I had ordered that size originally. The medium was way too big, but the xsmall fits perfectly. I would suggest looking at the size chart and not sizing up, even if you usually do that. These are quite high-waisted, so keep that in mind, as well. The fabric is very comfortable and feels nice against my skin. I like that there are zippered pockets.  ORIGINAL REVIEW: These pants run at least one size too big. They are also extremely high-waisted. I wonder if that is why they aren't flattering on me. Even if they were the right size, I don't think my body type is right for these. I like the olive green color, and the fabric feels really nice. I will see if these will work for my sister-in-law.

These joggers are baggy ah. They hug my hips/butt nicely though, but I am so happy I went down to an XS. I’m 5’7”, 115lbs, 27”Waist, 35”Hips, normally a small. They reach all the way down to my ankles and look cute bunched up or pulled down. Features zippered slant side pockets and a flattering seam in back. I got the black leopard and the fabric is pretty nice, lots of stretch, but not incredibly thick. So, a great choice for workouts, though they won’t keep you very warm in cold temps. Functional and stylish pants all around.

评论概述: I fold the elastic waist ban
评论详情: I wasn't a fan of the waist ban. It's too tight and when I fold it over once it fits A LOT better. Stylish and cute joggers.

Made of a silky material, these are transitional, not really for wear in deep winter. They're well made, and maybe fashionable. I would've much preferred the material to be more of a sweatpants type than what it is, which seems just to be made to go out and party in. Not my thing at my age.
Cute joggers, but they run a little big.I wear a small, but I probably could have gotten extra small. The material is very nice and soft.

This pant fits perfectly at the waist but is little longer than usual pants. It is good when working out as the fabric keeps u cool. It’s definitely not warm like most sweatpants. I wish I got a size down than what I got.

I love the color. They are very soft and a length is great. I also appreciate that they are high waisted. The reason they are a three instead of five star is because of the stomach area. They fit an odd where it too baggy. So while they’re comfortable, I’ll probably end up wearing them as pajamas as they are not very flattering.  Add originally had these at three stars because I don’t like the way they fit in the stomach area. They’re not flattering, but I had to add an extra star because they are extremely comfortable. They are true to size and I like the added detail of the zippered pockets.

Hate to complain, but..  sizing is way off.  They're huge on me, with an excessive amount of fabric overall, giving the effect of balloon pants  I'm thinking these could be a win for the larger ladies, but do nothing for you if you're on the slimmer side.  Really, they look nothing like the photo in terms of fit etc.All that complaining out of the way...  the fabric and overall quality are a flawless five stars.

I like the satiny, slippery, heavy yet thin, stretchy fabric.  Seams are all double stitched.  Wide elastic waistband with the cord to tie if desired.  I like the cuffs at the ankles which are the same material as the pants.  I am a 6-8 in pants ,5'7", but my waist is not tiny.  I ordered M, but I would order down if you do possess a slender waist.  I love these pants and would not hesitate to wear them out in public.  One tiny flaw that might disappear after washing.......  The zippered pockets have to cross an additional seam in front, and it gets stuck going down halfway.  You can ease it past, but it might bother some people, not me

These are soft and comfortable. I love the high waist fit and zip shut pockets. They actually look a lot like scrubs. As a doula, I will likely wear these to births, but also I like them as trendier colored pants to wear out walking, etc. The length is perfect for my 5'6" frame. The only kind of weird thing is the tie at the waist is unusually long, but I just tied it in a good bow. The material is soft and definitely polyester, but feels breathable.

I’m 5’6” 155lbs, ordered a Large to prevent a muffin top. As advertised- BUTTER SOFT. Zipper pockets to lock in valuables. They’re high waisted, but very comfortable for all day wear, versatile whether in the office or at a theme park. I picked pink but they had wrong color pictured. Pick your color based on picture, not description.
These joggers are really nice.  They are good quality and tts. They are flattering as well.

These are made of a sort of tech fabric that gives them a really nice drape and overall hand-feel. The leopard print is tone-on-tone with a lightly more satin finish though it’s still quite subtle. These fit true to size and the waistband is wide enough that is doesn’t dig into your tummy or do something else that’s rather unflattering. They’re fairly flattering for joggers thanks in part to the fabric choice and overall construction. The finishing has been nicely done, giving these a feel of good quality overall.
Nice and comfy pants can dress up or down

评论概述: They strike the ideal balance versatile enough to pair with heels or sneakers.
评论详情: Check out the addigi Women's Joggers Pants, featuring zipper pockets and a high-waisted design. These athletic drawstring sweatpants are perfect for lounging or working out in 2024. They strike the ideal balance between sophistication and comfort, making them versatile enough to pair with heels or sneakers, so you can rock them at parties or just chill at home.
Well made.  Fit as they should and have held up well to washing

But I ordered a size too large, 2xlg. The black ones I ordered, have a somewhat shine to them. They look good with heels! Since they're machine washable in cold water, I'll try to shrink them in hot water wash. Lol.

These are so comfy and long!  They fit well in the waistband and then are rather large everywhere else which I like.  They are very silky and soft.  They aren't super warm because they are lightweight but I wear these over my thermals for cold weather.
